name: Shmupemup: GET TO THE HOVERTANK
description:
Bullet hell made for Gutter Arcade Shmupemup game jam. Made in less than 10 hours(roughly). You coontrol a hovertank and have to survive as long as you can.

The game gets harder over time: more ennemies.

Controls:

Moving: left arrow, right arrow, down arrow, up arrow.

Shooting: Mouse(left click to fire)
